an4.260:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankham gacchati.
an4.260:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno bhadro assajaniyo vannasampanno ca hoti, balasampanno ca, javasampanno ca, arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an4.260:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankham gacchati.
an4.260:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an4.260:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vannasampanno ca hoti, balasampanno ca, javasampanno ca, arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an4.260:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an4.260:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vannasampanno hoti.
an4.260:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an4.260:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.
an4.260:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asavanam khaya …pe… sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an4.260:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti.
an4.260:6.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arohaparinahasampanno hoti.
an4.260:7.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
